about.summary: Yet Another Iterator Library for Python.

name: yail
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "yail" %}
{% set version = "0.0.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "3557bb65a94146cb8cb75a3b5392dc27b915d789d3d32283a0a4dd487fdc1c99" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - future >=0.15.2
    - toolz >=0.8.0

test:
  imports:
    - yail

about:
  home: https://github.com/jakirkham/yail
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Yet Another Iterator Library for Python.
  doc_url: https://yail.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/jakirkham/yail

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
